description: Listed building consent for the reinstatement of Georgian sash windows, enlargement of existing side lightwell and creation of a second side lightwell, increase headroom and extention of the basement, installation of staircase to the basement, removal of fireplaces
decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The works to which this consent relate shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans and specifications: [Flood risk assessment, Heritage & design statement, 1421-10P2, 1421-100P4, 1421-101P4, 1421-102P4, 1421-103P2 Received: 13/03/2023; 4443-01-B, 4443-02-B, 4443-03-B, 4443-04-B, 4443-05 Received: 20/03/2023; Supplement to the Flood Risk Assessment Report Received 29/06/2023; 1421-200P10,  1421-201P10, 1421-202P10, 1421-203P10; 4443-10-B Received: 10/07/2023; Constructions Logistic Plan, Received 13/11/2023].

Condition : 3 - All new internal and external works, including works of making good for the retained fabric, shall match the original work in type, colour, texture, profile and dimensions of materials and in detailed execution, including facebond and pointing.

Condition : 4 - The development shall be carried out in accordance with the following submitted plans, provided by the applicant to the Environment Agency on 06 October 2023: 
o	o Drawing 4443 10 B 'Changes to Flood Wall', prepared by RWA London, dated 5th October 2023 
o	o Drawing 1421-202 P10 'Proposed Elevations', prepared by WB London, dated February 2022 
o	o Drawing 1421-200 P10 'Proposed Basement and Ground Flood Plans', prepared by WB London, dated February 2022 
o	o Drawing 1421-201 P10 'Proposed First Floor and Roof Plans', prepared by WB London, dated February 2022 
o	o Drawing 1421-203 P10 'Proposed Sections', prepared by WB London, dated February 2023.
